00009 // TODO: 
00010 // NetBSD: u_short f_oflags - deprecated copy of mount flags
00011 // NetBSD: u_short f_flags - mount flags
00012 // OpenBSD: union mount_info mount_info - per fs mount options
00013 // FreeBSD: int32_t f_flags - mount flags
00014 // SCO OSR5: unsigned long f_flag - mount flags
00015 // solaris: u_long f_flag - mount flags
00016
